title: $:/litClock/times/-21:15-Sophie Kinsella
quote_first: What are we going to do? Should we try to walk to Clapham High Street? But it’s bloody miles away. I glance at my watch and am shocked to see that it’s
quote_last: . We’ve spent over an hour faffing about and we haven’t even had a drink. And it’s all my fault. I can’t even organize one simple evening without its going catastrophically wrong.
